com.budjb.requestbuilder
[Groovy] Class RequestProperties

java.lang.Object
  com.budjb.requestbuilder.RequestProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
class RequestProperties

A data object containing configuration options for an HTTP request to be executed by the Jersey Request Builder facade.

Field Summary
private java.lang.String accept

Accept header.
private java.lang.String basicAuthPassword

basic auth password
private java.lang.String basicAuthUserName

basic auth user name
private java.lang.Boolean binaryResponse

Whether the caller expects a binary return.
private java.lang.Object body

Body of the request - only useful on POST or PUT.
private java.lang.Integer chunkSize

Size (in bytes) to chunk the request.
private java.lang.Integer connectionTimeout

The Connection Timeout for the Client.
private java.lang.String contentType

Content-Type header.
private java.lang.Boolean convertJson

Whether to attempt to slurp JSON automatically.
private java.lang.Boolean convertXML

Attempt to use XmlSlurper to parse xml.
private java.util.Map cookies

Cookies to include with the request.
private java.lang.Boolean debug

Whether to log the request and response.
private java.lang.Boolean encodeGzip

Encode the request with gzip compression.
private java.lang.Boolean followRedirects

Whether to automatically follow redirects.
private java.util.Map form

Form parameters
private java.util.Map headers

Headers
private java.lang.Boolean ignoreInvalidSSL

Whether to ignore SSL cert validation.
private java.util.Map query

Query parameters.
private java.lang.Boolean rawClientResponse

If true, do not response handling, and return the raw response object.
private java.lang.Integer readTimeout

The Read Timeout for the Client.
private java.lang.Boolean skipStatusCheck

If true, do not check the response status code, and thus don't throw an exception for codes > 2xx.
private java.lang.Object uri

The URI to hit.
private java.lang.Boolean useBasicAuth

If true uses BasicAuth

accept

private java.lang.String accept
Accept header.

basicAuthPassword

private java.lang.String basicAuthPassword
basic auth password

basicAuthUserName

private java.lang.String basicAuthUserName
basic auth user name

binaryResponse

private java.lang.Boolean binaryResponse
Whether the caller expects a binary return. If true, the returned object will be a byte array. Note that this is a workaround to jersey not providing automatic content conversion based on mime type.

body

private java.lang.Object body
Body of the request - only useful on POST or PUT.

chunkSize

private java.lang.Integer chunkSize
Size (in bytes) to chunk the request.

connectionTimeout

private java.lang.Integer connectionTimeout
The Connection Timeout for the Client.

contentType

private java.lang.String contentType
Content-Type header.

convertJson

private java.lang.Boolean convertJson
Whether to attempt to slurp JSON automatically.

convertXML

private java.lang.Boolean convertXML
Attempt to use XmlSlurper to parse xml.

cookies

private java.util.Map cookies
Cookies to include with the request.

debug

private java.lang.Boolean debug
Whether to log the request and response.

encodeGzip

private java.lang.Boolean encodeGzip
Encode the request with gzip compression.

followRedirects

private java.lang.Boolean followRedirects
Whether to automatically follow redirects.

form

private java.util.Map form
Form parameters Note that if this is set, this is used and body is ignored.

headers

private java.util.Map headers
Headers

ignoreInvalidSSL

private java.lang.Boolean ignoreInvalidSSL
Whether to ignore SSL cert validation.

query

private java.util.Map query
Query parameters.

rawClientResponse

private java.lang.Boolean rawClientResponse
If true, do not response handling, and return the raw response object.

readTimeout

private java.lang.Integer readTimeout
The Read Timeout for the Client.

skipStatusCheck

private java.lang.Boolean skipStatusCheck
If true, do not check the response status code, and thus don't throw an exception for codes > 2xx.

uri

private java.lang.Object uri
The URI to hit. Can either be a String or an URI.

useBasicAuth

private java.lang.Boolean useBasicAuth
If true uses BasicAuth

getGrailsApplication

protected org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsApplication getGrailsApplication()
Returns the grails application bean. This method provides a convenience so that users are not responsible for injecting the Grails application bean themselves. This also does allow the Grails application bean to be injected for testing.
